title: <scroll-zoom-block>
intro: This block is interactive in the following ways: <ul><li>scroll by panning the block, or with arrow keyboard keys (when focused),<li>zoom with a mouse wheel, a pinch, a double click/tap, a maintained double tap followed by vertical scrolling, or −/+ keyboard keys (when focused),<li>if using the "controls" attribute, zoom with the −/+ buttons and slider.
